thread.title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Reysas REIT Acquires 65.8 Percent Shares Of Its Unit Reysas Turizm Through Takeover (Jan 3)

author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Reysas REIT Acquires 65.8 Percent Shares Of Its Unit Reysas Turizm Through Takeover (Jan 3)
text:
(Company corrects the price to 21.4 million lira from 26.8 million lira.)
Jan 31 (Reuters) - REYSAS REIT:
* ACQUIRES REMAINING 65.8 PERCENT SHARES OF ITS UNIT REYSAS TURIZM AT 21.4 MILLION LIRA
* BECOMES 100 PERCENT CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER OF REYSAS TURIZM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
